issue.title: [CF 1042] TMW Dissapears Even in Locked Mode
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Similarly, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type for your issue, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. /tmw to lock tellmewhen
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I expect the icons to remain on the screen and then activate the CD timer when I use an ability. Instead, they disappear and do not function when I use an ability. I would like to have them visible all the time, even when not usable. But it seems to be doing the opposite for some reason.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.2.1

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No

comments.body:
I am having the exact same problem.


> Posted by CurseForge user rileytucker

SOLVED

  • Type /tmw
  • Setup as usual
  • Right-click the icon you wish to see the cooldown timer for
  • Check the box next to the slider bars for both "Usable" and "Unusable"
  • In the "Timer Sweep" category check the boxes "Show Timer" and "Show Timer Text" OPTIONAL(for ElvUI users):
  • Type /tmw options
  • Check the box labeled "Disable Blizzard cooldown text"
  • Type /tmw and right click the icon you wish to see the timer for
  • In the "Timer Sweep" category check the box labeled "Show ElvUI timer text"
Edited Dec 7, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user rileytucker

Your "solution" is to an entirely different issue.

OP: Neither of these icons are tracking anything. You need to enter a spell to track on each icon if you want them to do anything. Right now, all they have is a custom texture.
